visualizations.description: Analysis of Height showing a ↑ 6.8% increase over the period.

visualizations.description: Comparison of Height across different Gender segments.

visualizations.title: Height Distribution
visualizations.description: Analysis of the Height distribution pattern showing normally distributed characteristics.

visualizations.title: Correlation Matrix
visualizations.description: Key relationships: Height & Weight (positive, 0.92), Weight & Height (positive, 0.92), Born_Year & Weight (positive, 0.02)

recommendations: Capitalize on the 6.8% growth in Height by identifying the key drivers and reinforcing those factors.
Capitalize on the 10.7% growth in Weight by identifying the key drivers and reinforcing those factors.
Learn from the success of the Male segment and apply those lessons to improve performance in the underperforming Female segment.
